metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "5 x 5 x 1.5 inches; 3.21 Ounces", "Item model number": "MSB-MC-05RO"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a set of makeup blender sponges and a foundation brush, which are tools used in the application of makeup. Therefore, it fits best in the 'Brushes & Tools' subcategory under 'Makeup' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
